18.eng-name: The Book of the Fear Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Bakrah that:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) led the people in offering the fear prayer, two rak'ahs. Then he said the taslim and led others in offering the fear prayer, then he said the taslim. So the Prophet (ﷺ) had prayed four rak'ahs

chapter.eng-name: The narrations mentioned for the Fear Prayer
